author: "Sean Kross"
date: "January 22, 2016"

---

Interactive Tutorials:

- [swirl](http://www.swirlstats.com)
- [Datacamp](https://www.datacamp.com/home)

Books (all free):

- [R Programming for Data Science](https://leanpub.com/rprogramming)  by Roger Peng
- [Exploratory Data Analysis with R](https://leanpub.com/exdata) by Roger Peng
- [Regression Models for Data Science in R](https://leanpub.com/regmods) by Brian Caffo
- [Developing Data Products in R](https://leanpub.com/ddp) by Brian Caffo
- [The Elements of Statistical Learning](http://statweb.stanford.edu/~tibs/ElemStatLearn/) by Trevor Hastie, Robert Tibshirani, and Jerome Friedman

Online Courses:

- [The Johns Hopkins Data Science Specialization on Coursera.org](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/jhu-data-science/1)
- [Standford University's Statistical Learning Course](https://lagunita.stanford.edu/courses/HumanitiesScience/StatLearning/Winter2014/about)
- [Udacity's Data Analysis with R Course](https://www.udacity.com/courses/ud651)
